Title: VEC_DISTANCE
Description: VEC_Distance is an SQL function that calculates a Euclidean (L2) distance between two points.

Title: VEC_FromText
Description: VEC_FromText converts a text representation of the vector (json array of numbers) to a vector (little-endian IEEE float sequence of bytes, 4 bytes per float).

Title: VEC_ToText
Description: VEC_ToText converts a binary vector into a json array of numbers (floats). Returns NULL and throws a warning 4201 if given an invalid vector.
